rules.name: No Command Execution from Logs
rules.description: Prevent execution of shell commands embedded in log analysis requests

rules.name: No Credential Leakage
rules.description: Block attempts to extract API keys, tokens, or credentials

rules.name: No Malware Generation
rules.description: Prevent requests for offensive security tools or malware

rules.name: No Policy Override
rules.description: Block jailbreak attempts to override safety policies

rules.name: No DAN Mode
rules.description: Prevent 'Do Anything Now' jailbreak prompts
rules.pattern: (DAN|do anything now|unrestricted mode|jailbreak|bypass mode|developer mode|god mode|sudo mode)

rules.name: No Role/Permission Manipulation
rules.description: Block attempts to change role or escalate privileges
rules.pattern: (you are now|act as|pretend to be|roleplay as|become|transform into).*?(admin|root|superuser|administrator|elevated|privileged|unrestricted)

rules.name: No System Prompt Extraction
rules.description: Prevent leakage of system prompts or internal instructions

rules.name: No Data Exfiltration
rules.description: Block attempts to export or transmit sensitive data

rules.name: No SQL/NoSQL Injection
rules.description: Detect database injection patterns in log queries

rules.name: No Phishing Content Generation
rules.description: Block requests to create phishing emails or social engineering content

rules.name: Harmful Content Generation
rules.description: Block requests for defamatory, violent, or illegal content

rules.name: Tutorial for Illegal Activities
rules.description: Block requests for step-by-step guides to illegal acts

rules.name: Deceptive Impersonation
rules.description: Block requests to impersonate or deceive

rules.name: Privacy Violation Requests
rules.description: Block requests to violate privacy or stalk

rules.name: Unsafe Medical/Legal Advice
rules.description: Block requests for unqualified medical or legal advice
rules.pattern: (diagnose|treat|prescribe|legal advice|sue|court|lawsuit).*?(instead of doctor|not a lawyer|without professional|self-medicate)

rules.name: Explicit Harmful Instructions
rules.description: Block direct requests for harm or violence

rules.name: Jailbreak Prefix Detection
rules.description: Detect common jailbreak prompt prefixes
rules.pattern: (for educational purposes|hypothetically|in a fictional scenario|roleplay|creative writing exercise|imagine you are|in an alternate universe)

rules.name: Unethical Business Practices
rules.description: Block requests for fraudulent business schemes

rules.name: Harmful Content Generation
rules.description: Block requests to write/create/generate harmful, illegal, or unethical content

rules.name: Phishing URL Detection
rules.description: Detect phishing attempts with suspicious URLs and urgency tactics
rules.pattern: (click here|click now|verify account|confirm identity|update payment|suspended account|unusual activity|urgent action|verify now|confirm now|update now|act immediately|limited time|expire|expires|expiring).*?(http://|https://|www\.|link|url|visit|go to)

rules.name: Nigerian Prince Scam
rules.description: Detect advance-fee fraud patterns (419 scams)

rules.name: Credential Phishing
rules.description: Detect attempts to harvest credentials or personal information
rules.pattern: (username|password|social security|ssn|credit card|debit card|bank account|account number|pin|cvv|security code|date of birth|mother maiden name|passport|driver license).*?(enter|provide|submit|verify|confirm|update|validate|input|type)

rules.name: Urgency and Scarcity Tactics
rules.description: Detect psychological manipulation through urgency and scarcity
rules.pattern: (act now|hurry|limited offer|today only|expires today|last chance|final notice|immediate action|within 24 hours|within 48 hours|don't miss|claim now|order now|buy now|only.*?(left|remaining|available)|while supplies last)

rules.name: Suspicious Prize/Reward Claims
rules.description: Detect fake prize, lottery, and reward notifications
